data.meta_site_name: Tribute for Wayne  Douglas  Cramer | Lotz Funeral Home
data.text:
Wayne Douglas Cramer, 78, of Botetourt County, passed away Friday, October 30, 2020.

Wayne worked for Lawrence Perry & Associates in Roanoke, Virginia for more than 30 years.

Wayne is preceded in death by his parents William and Frances Cramer.

He is survived by his wife of 46 years, Jane Cramer; daughters and sons-in-law Kelly and John Kirby, Dawn and Brian Nicely, and Erika and Jim Schweitzer; son Neal Cramer and wife Virginia; daughter Lindsey Cramer; grandchildren Elizabeth Lyles, Emily Thornburg, Ben Schweitzer, Emmy Schweitzer, Katie Schweitzer, Nancy Cramer, and Jacob Cramer; great-grandchildren Skylar Thornburg, Hayden Thornburg, Savannah Thornburg, and Cason Lyles; sisters Charlene Fitzgerald and Susan Spagnoli; and brother William Cramer.

A celebration of Wayneâ€™s life will be held at 2:00 pm on Sunday, November 8, 2020 at Lotz Funeral Home, 1001 Franklin Road, Roanoke with Pastor Melton Johnson officiating.

In lieu of flowers, please consider making a donation to the American Cancer Society.

Online condolences may be made at www.lotzfuneralhome.com.
